table.name: vtiger_testmulti
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_testmulti` ( `testmultiid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name_te` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `pplism` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`testmultiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_testmulticf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_testmulticf` ( `testmultiid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`testmultiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
